name: TRUEPILL
sampleDescriptions: Policies and procurement opportunities pertaining to access to affordable prescription drugs, diagnostics, and telehealth
Generally, issues pertaining to accessibility and affordability of prescription drugs, diagnostics, and telehealth. Procurement opportunities--particularly relating to COVID-19.
